desc: KC Running Company and Sports Medicine Store is your one stop shop for all things running! We have a wide range of run/walk specialty shoes from Brooks, Asics, Saucony, Hoka, New Balance and more. Our personal and informative fitting process will get you in the right shoes and includes a custom gait analysis.

layout.text: Welcome to our online store! KC Running Company was established in 2008 and we have been serving the Kansas City Metro area ever since. Many people know us as a running shoe store, but we do so much more! We work with physical therapists and doctors in the area to provide orthotics, braces, and other medical supplies for injury rehabilitation, injury prevention, and overall well-being. With two of the best stores under one roof, KC Running & Sports Medicine really does have you covered from head to toe.
